properties.name: The Statesman
properties.notes: Initial recon initiated. Luxury complex managed by Harbor Group. High standard of amenities, but potential for valet service optimization.

contacts.name: Property Manager
contacts.notes: Target for first Spark Page delivery.

properties.name: The Columns at Pilgrim Mill
properties.notes: Luxury complex near Lake Lanier. Managed by ECI Management. High-end positioning makes them sensitive to hallway appearance and odor. Target for 'Luxury Standard' pitch.
